institution: University of Alaska Southeast Juneau Campus
award_title: Collaborative Research: What Underpins the High Bioavailability of Glacier Organic Matter?
subject: When your pipeline uses 4 different tools
body:
Jason,

Pipelines that chain mass spec processing, radiocarbon analysis, and source modeling rarely get reused. Too many dependencies, preprocessing quirks, format conversions between steps.

I built Ouro to make published computational methods actually callableâ€”not just described in a methods section that nobody reimplements.

Quick chat in the new year about reusable pipelines?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
